intro: Code Ninja in Training: Where Bugs Bow and Creativity Rules!
about_me:
I'm a dedicated student on the path to becoming a full-stack developer. Despite my initial foray into the workforce at a fast-food chain, where I refined my customer service skills, my true passion lies in coding. Currently pursuing a Bachelors Degree in Information Technology, I'm eager to master both front-end and back-end development, with a keen interest in creating innovative, user-friendly applications.

Beyond my academic endeavors, I've actively contributed to managing a school supplies delivery business, gaining insights into organization, logistics, and the power of technology to streamline processes. These experiences have molded me into a versatile individual with a strong work ethic, adaptability, and a drive to bridge the gap between technology and practical solutions in my aspiring career as a full-stack developer.
